sn21.10:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn21.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ceva hoti ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī.
sn21.10:1.3: So eko gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisati eko paṭikkamati eko raho nisīdati eko caṅkamaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
sn21.10:1.4: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn21.10:1.5: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu theranāmako ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
sn21.10:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn21.10:2.2: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena theraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
sn21.10:2.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā thero tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ theraṁ etadavoca:
sn21.10:2.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā thero tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ theraṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21.10:2.7: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, thera, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti?
sn21.10:2.9: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, thera, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti?
sn21.10:2.10: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, eko gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisāmi eko paṭikkamāmi eko raho nisīdāmi eko caṅkamaṁ adhiṭṭhāmi.
sn21.10:2.11: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, ekavihārī ekavihārassa ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
sn21.10:3.2: Api ca, thera, yathā ekavihāro vitthārena paripuṇṇo hoti
sn21.10:3.3: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn21.10:3.6: Idha, thera, yaṁ atītaṁ taṁ pahīnaṁ, yaṁ anāgataṁ taṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ, paccuppannesu ca attabhāvapaṭilābhesu chandarāgo suppaṭivinīto.
sn21.10:3.7: Evaṁ kho, thera, ekavihāro vitthārena paripuṇṇo hotī”ti.
sn21.10:4.2: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
